description: Always see some new places and the stunning Nusa Penida will enchant you to stay longer. Dolphin Snorkeling Penida is the best choice for your holiday to Nusa Penida Island. We will take you to visit unique and new places.
heroTextHome: Experience the Magic of the Sea with the Lovina Bali Dolphin Tour.

contact.textContact: Discover diving adventures in Lovina, Bali, contact us now!
contact.paragContact: Immerse yourself in the beauty of Lovina's underwater world with our extraordinary diving tours. Explore vibrant coral reefs, encounter majestic marine life, and create unforgettable memories beneath the waves. Our expert guides ensure a safe and exhilarating experience for divers of all levels. Contact us today to embark on an adventure that will leave you breathless!

about.textAbout: Experience eco-friendly adventures with Lovina Private Dolphin Tours.
about.parag1: Lovina Dolphin Private Tour is a private tour service provider based in Lovina, North Bali. Lovina is famous for its amazing dolphin tourism. As a professional tour provider, Lovina Private Tour offers a unique and unforgettable tourism experience for its customers.
about.parag2: With skilled and experienced staff, Lovina Private Tour is committed to providing the best service to every customer. We provide various tour packages tailored to your needs and preferences, from dolphin watching tours to exploring the natural beauty and culture of North Bali.

packages.textPackages: Explore our diverse tour packages for dolphin watching, snorkeling, and more in Lovina, Bali.

poster.text: Experience the unforgettable sensation of watching dolphins in Lovina Bali! For only 350.000 thousand rupiah, you can enjoy a dolphin show for up to 4 people. Package includes boat, captain, life jacket and mineral water. Order now and make your moment special!

payment.text: Please make a 30% down payment to the following bank account
payment.name: PUTU AWYA WAHARIKA

aboutLovina.title: About Lovina, Bali
aboutLovina.p1: Welcome to Lovina, Bali, where the beauty of underwater world and the stunning dolphin shows are the main attractions. Here, visitors can experience the marvels of nature as they witness the playful pods of dolphins frolicking in the waters around Lovina. The experience of watching dolphins in Lovina is not only enjoyable but also provides a deeper understanding of the extraordinary marine life.
aboutLovina.p2: But that's not all this destination also offers breathtaking snorkeling adventures amidst the beautiful coral reefs. Floating above the water, visitors can enter a colorful and vibrant underwater world, witnessing fishes swimming among the stunning coral reefs. Lovina, with its captivating natural beauty and exciting activities, is a paradise for nature lovers and adventure enthusiasts in Bali.

personAndAdditional.person: This package is designed for 1 to 4 people. However, if you plan to come with a larger group, an additional fee of Rp 100.000 per person will be charged for each additional participant.
personAndAdditional.etc: Extra 100K / Person, if more than 4 people

duration.title: Duration And Activities
duration.desc: The duration of the trip ranges from 2 to 4 hours, depending on the activities of the dolphins and the weather. You will be taken to explore wide waters and enjoy rare moments watching dolphins swim freely in the wild.

reviews.name: Sarah Johnson
reviews.review: I had an amazing experience with Lovina Private Dolphin Tour. The staff was friendly, the tour was well-organized, and we had the opportunity to see dolphins up close. Highly recommended!

reviews.name: Michael Anderson
reviews.review: Lovina Private Dolphin Tour exceeded my expectations. The guides were knowledgeable, and the boat was comfortable. The only downside was that we didn't see as many dolphins as we hoped, but overall, it was a great experience.

reviews.name: Jessica Smith
reviews.review: Lovina Private Dolphin Tour was the highlight of our trip to Bali. The sunrise dolphin watching tour was breathtaking, and the guides made sure we had a memorable experience. I would definitely do it again!

reviews.name: David Thompson
reviews.review: Overall, Lovina Private Dolphin Tour was good, but there were some areas for improvement. The boat was a bit crowded, and we had difficulty seeing dolphins because of the number of other boats in the area.
